page.title: 07NEW SHOPPING CENTRES
page.content: Since the new sewerage system has been installed the building embargo on houses , shops and offices has been lifted. This has led to the building of several new shops in an arcade off{ {The Platt}and{Polmorla Road}. The shops are small and include a fruit shop, delicatessan, jewellers, shoe repairers and an auction room and art gallery. There is a restaurant and take away food shop, antiques, health foods and a high class butchers selling venison, partridge, quail, salmon and trout. There is an attractive wind vane over the entrance on{The Platt}which is in the form of a golden camel. The camel disappeared one night and then was mysteriosly returned. The second phase of the development is now under construction and will include an area for outdoor theatre .
